channel.title: [Audio] Rocket Launch Replays [Fixed]
channel.description:
map: bm_c2a2c pos: 1604.812500 -626.151428 320.031250
After the rocket launched, I watched it fly up for a few seconds, until the flare disappeared, turned around, and quicksaved. I ran around a bit, reloaded for whatever reason, and the last half of "seven" in the countdown played, with the rocket's audio (engines coming on, firing, etc.) continuing for the full duration after.
I have four saves in that area: one auto from when the rocket is pretty high in the air, one quick that I mentioned above, an auto after walking into the newly opened area with the electrified water, and one quick standing on the new tram. All four behave as described when I load them.
I hope that makes sense. I'll see if it's stuck to all future save games or if it's just this area/map.

item.title: [Audio] Rocket Launch Replays [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: efeman
item.description:
map: bm_c2a2c
pos: 1604.812500 -626.151428 320.031250

After the rocket launched, I watched it fly up for a few seconds, until the flare disappeared, turned around, and quicksaved. I ran around a bit, reloaded for whatever reason, and the last half of “seven” in the countdown played, with the rocket’s audio (engines coming on, firing, etc.) continuing for the full duration after.

I have four saves in that area: one auto from when the rocket is pretty high in the air, one quick that I mentioned above, an auto after walking into the newly opened area with the electrified water, and one quick standing on the new tram. All four behave as described when I load them.

I hope that makes sense. I’ll see if it’s stuck to all future save games or if it’s just this area/map.
